idea-plugin.name: Consul K/V Support
idea-plugin.description:
Consul by Hashicorp Key/Value browser and editor

See Consul.io for further details.

This is an unofficial plug-in, not affiliated with Hashicorp.

  • Browse Consul K/V repository. Add, edit and remove entries and folders.
  • Define multiple Consul instances and easily switch between them
  • Export the contents of a Consul folder to the .properties file
  • Paste values like version=1 directly from the Clipboard to the Consul tree
  • Copy values to the Clipboard in the =-delimited format
idea-plugin.change-notes:
0.5

  • Enable speedsearch and Expand/Collapse buttons on the K/V tree
  • Enable Clipboard paste for multiple entries
  • Reenable compatibility with older IntelliJ versions

0.4

  • Improve tree-loading performance
  • Properly handle special characters in key names
  • Fix inability to edit Consul host configurations

0.3

  • UI is rehauled to better conform to IntelliJ tree behaviour.
  • Support usual keyboard shortcuts to create and delete entries
  • Support copy and paste on the entries. If the clipboard contains =-delimited line, you can paste it directly into the Consul tree.
  • Show K/V values next to tree nodes
  • Allow editing of Consul nodes
  • Huge refactoring of tree internals

0.2

  • Many improvements on tree behaviour and item display
  • Allow to export folder into a file.

0.1

  • Initial Release
